news.title: Gilgamesh Ventures Injects $20M into Fintech's Future
news.body: Gilgamesh Ventures, a keen player in the fintech VC space, has filled its coffers with $20 million for Fund II, targeting promising startups like Baselayer and Nexu. It's a clear signal that niche fintech investment is not just surviving but thriving.

news.title: VC Fintech Funding Hits a Speed Bump, Dips Below 2019 Levels
news.body: The fintech funding frenzy took a breather in 2024, with investments falling 11.6% from the previous year. This pullback to pre-pandemic levels suggests a recalibration of investor enthusiasm in the fintech sector.

news.title: Affirm Secures a Whopping $750M from Liberty Mutual
news.body: In a major boost to its expansion plans, Affirm has bagged a $750 million loan commitment from Liberty Mutual. This partnership not only fuels Affirm's growth but also marks a significant vote of confidence in its business model, with Liberty Mutual planning a hefty $5 billion investment streak through 2027.

news.title: Circle and Chime Ride the IPO Wave to Market Triumph
news.body: The fintech sector showed its strength at the stock market with Circle and Chime experiencing impressive IPO pops. This robust market reaction hints at a fertile ground for future fintech IPOs, potentially kicking off a race among upcoming public listings.

news.title: Blockchain Bonanza: Industry to Net $20B in Next Five Years
news.body: The blockchain arena is set to explode, with projections pointing to a $20 billion profit surge over the next half-decade. This growth is not just a win for blockchain companies but marks a transformative shift in the broader financial landscape.

curiosity.text: Did you know that despite the cooling off in fintech investments, specific sectors like blockchain are predicted to see exponential growth, suggesting a selective yet significant confidence in tech-driven financial solutions?
